summary: This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein, detailing multiple convictions including fraud and sex offenses. It includes personal information such as his date of birth, addresses, and a summary of his criminal history, highlighting his status as a convicted sex offender.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a convicted offender with multiple charges including solicitation of prostitution and sexual assault. He is noted to have been sentenced to 21 months in federal prison for these offenses.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Alert
events.description: Deutsche Bank issued alerts regarding Jeffrey Epstein's criminal history, including convictions for fraud and sex offenses.

locations: New York, New York, UNITED STATES
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was sentenced to 21 months in federal prison for three counts of fraud.
He was also sentenced for sexually assaulting a girl.
Epstein has a felony count of solicitation of prostitution.
The document includes alerts dated 05/28/2013 from Deutsche Bank regarding Epstein's criminal history.
Epstein is listed as a convicted sex offender in the Florida Department of Law Enforcement records.
